content:
From the heavy shock drone "Vampir" the border guards of the brigade of the Guard of the offensive "revenge" were kissed in the Luhansk region in a crossing across the river Zherebets.

Appropriate videoShe made publicState Border Service of Ukraine

"As a result of her (ed. - crossing) destroyed, and the logistics of the invaders in that area is now complicated," the post reads.
title: The border "vampire" destroyed the enemy crossing through the Zherebets River
description: The relevant video was published by the State Border Service of Ukraine "As a result of it (ed ....
author: Army Inform
